summary.p: Returns a specified number raised to the specified power.

syntax.code: POWER(basis AS double, exponent AS double) RETURNS double

param.name: basis
param.p: A double-precision floating-point number to be raised to a power.

param.name: exponent
param.p: A double-precision floating-point number that specifies a power.

returns.p: The number basis raised to the power exponent.
